verbs.description: He [V: was] speaking on the back of tariffs being imposed on the country by the Trump administration .
[ARG0: He] was [V: speaking] [ARGM-MNR: on the back of tariffs being imposed on the country by the Trump administration] .
He was speaking on the back of tariffs [V: being] imposed on the country by the Trump administration .
He was speaking on the back of [ARG1: tariffs] being [V: imposed] [ARG2: on the country] [ARG0: by the Trump administration] .
